summary: An ordinance relating to the valuation, for taxation purposes, of the leasehold interest of the Metropolitan Building Company; providing additional funds to be used by the Corporation Counsel to defray the cost and expense necessarily incurred by the City in connection with an appeal to the courts by the Company and the City; appropriating Three Thousand One Hundred ($3,100.00) Dollars from the Emergency Fund therefor and declaring an emergency making necessary such appropriation.
